title: Styled
overview: Styled follows the staging and renovation adventures of Nicole Babb and Caffery Vanhorne, best friends and design experts, as they transform spaces from drab to fab. With help from Nicole's family-owned interior design business and a team of skilled contractors by their side, this dynamic design duo brings their vision to life on projects big and small. Whether adding value to a property before it hits the market, or turning a house into a forever home, Nicole and Caffery elevate each space with glamour and style.
